entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8032 for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions with 5.0.100 SDK #82274
  • [wasm] `System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.TestFunctionPointers` failing with AOT on linux #82272
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] `System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests` failing with chrome ` Expected 210 assets to be downloaded, but only finished 211` #82271
  • [release/7.0][mono] Coredump on Alpine Linux Edge #82269
  • Test failure in System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests #82266
  • [QUIC] Revisit exceptions in Quic #82262
    8.0.0
  • Empty DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS causes error entries in Application log in Windows. #82260
  • Enable HTTP/3 stress on Windows #82258
    8.0.0
  • ByRef type name created by TypeBuilder and referenced in IL produces wrong result on Mono #82257
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed: GCHeapUtilities::GetGCHeap()->IsInFrozenSegment(obj) #82252
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #82251
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks in .NET 8 does not target .NET 8 #82241
    8.0.0
  • OSX infra issue - prereq check for 'pkg-config' missing #82240
  • "Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program." Exception encountered - on "(dynamic)" method call for overload resolution #82239
  • Consider detecting stalled HTTP/2 connections in SocketsHttpHandler #82236
  • NativeAOT EventPipe library needs to work correctly when EventSource support is enabled #82231
    8.0.0
  • build v7.0.3 hit the error: error ST L1001: Unexpected compiler version, expected MSVC 19.34 or newer. #82229
  • Regressions in System.Hashing.GetStringHashCode #82243
  • Clarification on NuGet versioning with regards to supported SDK/runtime #82225
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where callee requires no initialization #82224
    Future
  • No well define API to set Process Affinity that works on multi-NUMA-node and multi-cpu-groups #82220
  • BadImageFormatException when calling static virtual method in interface #82217
    8.0.0
  • Some OOB assemblies are not copying intellisense extracted from docs package #82214

Closed

  • JIT/opt/Compares/compares should seemingly not be passing file-check on arm64 #81531
    8.0.0
  • macOS: Cannot add to X509Store #80176
  • Crash when deserializing certain types in Blazor Web Assembly projects when project is published #81746
    8.0.0
  • Binary DataContract Serialization raises exception with certain contents. #81290
  • XML deserialize self closing raw element #80699
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 23 Regressions on 2/9/2023 12:40:40 PM #82111
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext doesn't support function pointer types #43791
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Reflection introspection support for FunctionPointer #69273
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in ConcurrentDictionary #82105
    8.0.0
  • Test failures: jitpartialcompilation_pgo #82128
    8.0.0
  • Can't deserialize object despite custom JsonSerializerContext in Blazor WASM #81709
  • runtime-community pipeline fails to build #82161
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 1/27/2023 2:26:56 PM #81551
    8.0.0
  • Why `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer` serialize the wrapper properties by default? #82237
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull<T> #82227
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10042) - SetMulticastOption #81507
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #82106
    8.0.0
  • generation of RID graph no longer works #82125
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT codegeneration question #82023
  • LdapConnection Bind() takes longer on Windows 11 #79836
    Future
  • Test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.XUnitExtensions.SkipTestException : Precision on float numbers #82141
  • XUnitLogChecker causes GCStress test failures #82143
    8.0.0
  • Remove MS.Extensions.Logging.Console's dependency on ConfigurationBinder #81931
    8.0.0
  • Mono AOT Compiler packs are missing `data/UnixFilePermissions.xml`? #82201
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [workloads] Bump net7 package version #82270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix runtime-community pipeline #82265
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Remove duplicate range check in VSB.Append(char) #82264
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82263
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Improved logic of listener AcceptConnection #82261
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [mono][doc] The path of sdkmanager on android_sdk was changed #82256
    area-Meta
  • Avx512 single kmask #82255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor Logging.Console configure options #82254
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasi] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82245
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Remove iossimulator_x86 from helix-queues-setup.yml #82244
    area-Build-mono
  • [wip] Test ios-arm64 CI job for the dedup improvement #82238
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, Future
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wasi icu test #82233
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove EOL Linux versions from runtime graph. #82223
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use latest sdk 7.0 sdk for workload testing, and perf runs #82219
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix clr build on illumos-x64 #82183
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [SuperFileCheck] Added verification when using 'FULL-LINE-NEXT'. Fixing ARM64 comparison tests. #82135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hold temporary keychain refs for certificates imported with X509Certificate2Collection.Import #82205
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Replace `dynamic` with static math in a JIT test #82073
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark DivRem with RequiresPreviewFeatures #82221
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Initialize il_offset for allocated basic blocks #82242
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add copyright info to eventpipe shim files #82232
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Mark .overrides from marked methods in a copy assembly #82197
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: fix some asserts in profile incorporation and reconstruction #82196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add cmake check for ioclt prototype #82173
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82204
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update CODEOWNERS #82131
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip wasm frames if just my code is enabled #81732
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fill missing @mention data in area-owners.json #82228
    area-Meta
  • Avoid a RIP relative addressing pessimization #82213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include more details in exception from wrong async callback #82104
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Expand loop detection in if-conversion #82170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Slightly refactor handling of conditions/conditional branches in the backend #82020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix tests to use ConditionalFact that need it #82203
    area-System.Drawing
  • [wasm] Add jiterpreter trace transfer and other optimizations #82149
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Prevent XUnitLogChecker from failing if no logs are found #82212
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove ConfigurationBinder usage from Console Logging #82098
    area-Extensions-Logging, size-reduction
  • Workloads: Fix a regression in file permissions for workload packs #82211
    area-Workloads
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [MONO] Implement GC.AddMemoryPressure in Mono #82121
    area-GC-mono
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2116253 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add EventPipe library support to CrossGen2 #82200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Create source generator for ConfigurationBinder #82179
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Disable additional sourcegenerator tests #82184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NativeAOT build integration targets to include ioslike platforms #82086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • Use optimistic concurrency when configuring JsonTypeInfo metadata. #82198
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build test tree with partial trimming #82157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need better docs on Mac signing #30681
  • Console project template - missing space in German translation for top level statements #30676
  • Github Release page not up to date #30671
  • Workload experience for out-of-tree workloads poor, especially on upgrades #30661

Closed

  • Packaging .NET tool includes unused transitive dependency System.Drawing.Common #30670

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30680
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert MSBuild to match VS 17.5.0 GA #30674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] Add abstract modifier for an abstract event. #30672
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30645
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30635
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Downgrade errors for specifying `--output` for solutions to warnings #30660
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2116243 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update net7.0 TFM references to net8.0 #66930
  • Navigation to errors in files generated by a source generator in Roslyn from build output doesn't work in VS #66928
  • CS8602 Nullable warning is missing #66921
  • The analyzer assembly references version '4.6.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.5.0.0' #66918
  • New APIs for "Primary Constructors" #66914
  • API proposal for "Using Alias to any Type" #66913

Closed

  • Background analysis performance improvements #66714
    17.6
  • Visual Studio 17.4 Incorrect Enforcing of New Breaking Change in Earlier C# Versions #66646
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Program.cs #66931
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add 'ExpandValueTuple' as a misc symbol display flag #66929
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide access to F# integration tests #66926
    Area-IDE
  • Clean with authority #66925
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize checks in AnalyzerExecutor #66923
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use WhereAsArray to avoid allocations in all/none cases #66922
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow LSP code action requests to set the (new) AllowGenerateInHiddenCode option #66917
    Area-IDE
  • Hoist address-of operators across await boundaries #66915
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Address PROTOTYPE comments for "Primary Constructors" #66865
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [PERF] Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66920
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move the 'make method async' fixer down to shared layer #66863
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66912
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66911
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE
  • Thread blocking issue - freeze linked documents #66904
    Area-IDE
  • Improve 'introduce variable for expression' when using tuples #66909
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Avoid loading DiaSymReader unless Windows PDB is actually read #66901
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Include nullability informtion in QuickInfo when invoked on 'var' #66877
    Area-IDE
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows #46717
  • gRPC JSON transcoding / Support custom JsonConverter #46712
  • [SignalR - Typescript client] Make the client SSR Frameworks compliant #46708
  • SignalR with singelton service makes client halt under load #46707
  • "Unobserved task exception in sender" in Asp.net core SignalR server #46706
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR dotnet client #46705
  • [Blazor] Mechanism for rendering a "remote" component on to the page. #46704
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Under certain circumstances, the HttpLogging middleware does not follow the ResponseBodyLogLimit setting #46703
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #46701
  • Add F# webapi template tests #46700
  • Address generating FQN for types in RDF #46694
    8.0-preview3

Closed

  • Using minimal APIs source generator results in null dereference warnings (CS8602) #46446
    8.0-preview2
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder for Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #46293
    8.0-preview2
  • Horizontal tabs causing issues in header values #46543
  • Exception 'GetAuthenticationStateAsync was called before SetAuthenticationState.' thrown when calling AuthenticationStateProvider.GetAuthenticationStateAsync() method #28684
    8.0-preview2
  • Framework does not handle Request cancellation properly #44697
    8.0-preview2
  • Why `Result.ValidationProblem` requires `IDictionary<string, string[]>` instead of `IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]>`? #46689
  • Set dynamically @page #46529
  • component dont update the changing value #46634
  • MAUI over the web? #46702
  • Add friendly display name for the Blazor WebAssembly debugging extension for VSCode #33196
    Backlog
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #46699
  • Disabling integrity check for "/_framework/dotnet.7.0.2.<random>.js" #46612
  • blazor wasm duplicated requests when using individual account auth #46658
  • < Sammyboy #46697
  • Bigboy #46698
  • Improve the error message when applying [FromXX] on parameters that don't support binding #44218
    8.0-preview2
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943

PullRequests

Created

  • Retry ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows test #46718
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
  • Add 'dotnet new' web item templates (razor view, api controller, mvc controller) #46714
    area-mvc
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Update .npmrc approach and locked dependencies #46601
    8.0-preview2
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Revert "Remove unnecessary code from F# templates" #46695
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Tweak exception message for `TryParse` method not found #46574
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Add support for parameter binding with [FromService] #46653
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Sync shared code from runtime #46690
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Fix nullability on DefaultEndpointFilterInvocationContext constructor #46679
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Introducing `IProblemDetailsService.TryWriteAsync` #46680
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Update to Helix 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • WIP: Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Transport.Quic.Tests: don't fail on distros that don't have quic. #46662
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • [AOT] Add Http.Results RouteValueDictionary overloads #46594
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView leaks memory when ItemsSource has changed #13393
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand is not called on iOS #13391
  • Border.StrokeShape clips content on Android, not iOS #13388
    Backlog
  • [IOS] Issue with ContentView not being resized inside an Border with Ellipse as Stroke Shape. #13387
    Backlog
  • Maui ImageElement CancelOldValue stuck in main thread many times #13384
  • Nuget Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK Error #13382
  • Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape threw an exception #13379
  • MAUI multi-targeting is completely broken #13377

Closed

  • Editors not scrollable on iOS/Catalyst #12485
    Backlog

Created

  • [net7.0] When measuring FlexLayout unconstrained, allow child to be desired size #13399
    area/layout 🔲
  • Merge main to net8 #13345

  • Ensure OnMeasure always calls SetMeasuredDimension in ShellPageContainer #13153
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Merge hierarchyid tests into existing suites #30301
  • Serialization settings with Cosmos Db Provider #30300
  • Update-Database command uses incorrect path #30298
  • System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #30295

Closed

  • Querying a million records #30299
  • NotSupportedException result when using scalar returning function #30258
  • i changed scaffold-dbcontext template for class name its work but i cant change filename #30284
  • Configure OwnedType via convention #30251
  • InMemory provider v7.x.x: FromSqlRaw throws InvalidOperationException: Query root of type 'FromSqlQueryRootExpression' wasn't handled by provider code. #30246
  • PreProcess query BEFORE extracting query parameters #30208
  • Sql Server, using OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.SetNull) on parent entity, where child have a trigger should not use OUTPUT #30206
  • Owned types with composite primary keys that include the foreign key fail on searches #30205
  • Use init setter for DbSet #30198
  • Mirosoft.Data.Sqlite 7.0, SQLite Error 19: 'FOREIGN KEY constraint failed' #30081
  • Comparing a property with a value converter against null throws exception in EF7 InMemory #29603
    8.0.0-preview1
  • Scaffolded DbContext produces CS8618 nullability warning since upgrade to EF Core 7 #29582
  • How to use DbGeography and DbGeometry data types with UseChangeTrackingProxies() mode? #30269
  • When I update multiple entities whose navigation properties are the same object, only one of the entities is successfully updated #30281

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Arcade's pool-providers.yml #30296
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • SqlServer: Support hierarchyid #30291
  • feat: normalize migrations file #28367
